description:
Sweepr HD is also available for the HP Touchpad on the App Catalog! 

Organize, Enter, WIN! Sweepr is a sweepstakes "to-do" app that helps with managing sweepstakes, giveaways, contests and more. Based on the type of sweep it is (once, daily, weekly, etc), Sweepr makes sweeping much easier! 

------------------------------- 
LATEST VERSION - 1.5.0 
New Features 
-Sort (alphabetical, end date, next date, type) 

Changes 
-Moved delete button for easier access

------------------------------- 
Initial Version - 1.1.0 | 12/15/2011 
Features 
-Adding sweeps 
-Deleting sweeps
